description:
Logigraph is a piece of equipment worn by Logicalists, taking the form of an earphone with a mic. When activated, the Logigraph says "Judge your logic," then generates a screen in front of the user`s eyes. Once on, a Logigraph has a variety of functions, including data analysis, communication, closing gates, and forming contracts. Staff members in an ALCA control room are responsible for analyzing and calculating data sent from Logigraphs.
Source: luckandlogic.wikia.com
name: Logigraph
